original: Blomquist, Erik Emanuel, vägdirektör, Vänersborg, _ f. 30/10/89 i Söderköp. av Carl Erik B. o. Anna Charlotta Grahn. G. 22 m. Mallan Ericson. — Mog:ex. i Norrköp. 08, utex. fr. KTH (VoV) 13. An’st. v. pro’f. H. Kreügers ing:firma i Sthlm 13-16, A-B Vattenbyggn :bvrån 16-18, Stora Kopparb. Bergsl. Ä-B 18-22, Södra Sv:es statsarb. i Gbg 22-24, stat. arb :-lösh :komm. i Sthlm 24, arb :chefsas-sist. där 28, byråchef i ’Stat. arb:-markn :komm. 40, vägdir. i Älvsb. län ised. 43. Led. av Sv. tekn:fören.. Sv. vägfören. RVO, RNO.
translated: Blomquist, Erik Emanuel, Road Director, Vänersborg, born on October 30th, 1889, in Söderköping to parents Carl Erik B. and Anna Charlotta Grahn. Married to Mallan Ericson in 1922. Completed his studies at Norrköping Technical College in 1908 and graduated from KTH (VoV) in 1913. Employed at Professor H. Kreuger's engineering firm in Stockholm from 1913 to 1916, A-B Water Construction Bureau from 1916 to 1918, Stora Kopparberg Bergsl. Ä-B from 1918 to 1922, Southern Swedish State Work in Gothenburg from 1922 to 1924, Unemployment Relief Committee in 1924, assistant chief of labor in 1928, bureau chief in 1940, and road director in Älvsborg County in 1943. He was a member of the Swedish Engineering Association and Swedish Road Association, as well as a recipient of the Royal Order of Vasa and the Royal Norwegian Order.
